title: Eric Newman and the Diamond Crown Black Diamond
itunes:title: Eric Newman and the Diamond Crown Black Diamond
description:
It’s hours before the Two Guys Smoke Shop event called The Last Supper and the FDA regulations are just hours away. We will have live in studio Eric Newman from JC Newman Cigar Company as we unveil a cigar a decade in the making, Black Diamond.

We will also smoke a special 1895 Julius Caesar Connecticut Perfecto made for Eric Newman to give out at events. However, thanks to the FDA this cigar will no longer exist.

Join us for all the madness known as The Cigar Authority.
